content: MT-C-T 3D/2 Wing fitting Double wing fitting for connecting three strut channels in a 3D structure ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Easy to install – compatible with the Hilti MT Twist-Lock, a faster alternative to spring nuts for assembling a modular support system Flexible - allows fixation of 2 horizontal strut elements on any adjacent faces of a vertical strut member Adaptable – unlike welding, angle brackets allow you to modify strut channel framing during installation and for future MEP requirements Extensive software support – PROFIS Modular Support Engineering, the MEP Support Selector, Revit® families, and plug-ins for Staad Pro® and Smart 3D® are all available to streamline design and ordering Applications Fastening three MT strut channels together Assembling 3D metal framing for MEP support structures Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Pre-galvanized - for dry indoor use only Material thickness: 6 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2272058 - Connector MT-C-T 3D/2 transversal - Package Size 10 pc
tag_description: Double wing fitting for connecting three strut channels in a 3D structure
